thread.title: Pope Claims Muslim Terrorism Is A Myth

author: Infowars.com
title: Pope Claims Muslim Terrorism Is A Myth
text:
Pope Claims Muslim Terrorism Is A Myth Pope Francis downplays terror threat in push for one world religion Infowars.com - February 22, 2017 Comments 
Alex Jones breaks down the Pope’s anti-Christian rhetoric as well as his recent claim that “Muslim terrorism does not exist.” Get the latest breaking news & specials from Alex Jones and the Infowars Crew. Related Articles Today on the Alex Jones Show Watch the Show Get the latest breaking news & specials from Alex Jones and the Infowars crew.
